name: Clin N Pancreas Other
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note:** Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).

**Regional lymph nodes**

    Celiac
    Hepatic
    Infrapyloric (subpyloric)
    Lateral aortic (lumbar)
    Pancreaticosplenic (pancreaticolienal)
    Peripancreatic, NOS
        Anterior, NOS
            Anterior pancreaticoduodenal
            Anterior proximal mesenteric
             Pyloric
        Inferior to the head and body of pancreas
        Posterior, NOS
            Pericholedochal (common bile duct)
            Posterior pancreaticoduodenal
            Posterior proximal mesentery
        Superior to the head and body of pancreas 
    Retroperitoneal
    Splenic (lienal), NOS
        Gastroepiploic (gastro-omental), left
        Splenic artery
        Splenic hilum
        Suprapancreatic
    Superior mesenteric
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

    Physician unable to assess N
    Regional lymph node involvement cannot be determined or findings inconclusive
Physician assigns cNX, no other information available to determine N

Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS 

Stated as N1

Primary site/histology not TNM defined

Clinical classification criteria not met

    No information about diagnostic workup
    Results not documented in record

Only Clinical Stage Group documented (no T, N, or M information available)
